搫搫搫

搫字的基本解释

搫
pán
手不正。

搫
bān
古同“搬”，搬运。

搫
pó
清扫；扫除：“尔乃搫场拄翳，停偅葱翠”。
披散。
敛聚。

搫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pó］
［《廣韻》薄波切，平戈，並。］
［《廣韻》薄官切，平桓，並。］
除；扫除。
[②]［bān］
同“搬1”。

搫字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　搫； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页448第02
【唐韻】薄官切【集韻】【韻會】蒲官切，?音盤。【說文】搫擭不正也。又【廣雅】除也。　又【唐韻】薄波切【集韻】蒲波切，?音婆。亦除也。【潘岳·射雉賦】搫場拄翳。【註】搫者，開除之名。射者，除地爲場。拄翳於草也。【六臣文選】作㨇。　又披散也。一曰斂聚也。【集韻】或作㩯。

搫字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
搫字的起名意思

暂无。

Pinch
pán
Hand is wrong.
Pinch
bān
Gu Tong "moved" and moved.
Pinch
pó
Sweeping; Sweeping: "Er Nai squeezes the field, stops the lush green".
Phisan.
Converge.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pó］
["Guang Yun" Bo Boche, Ping Ge, and. ]
["Guangyun" Boguan cut, Pinghuan, and. ]
Remove; sweep away.
[②]［bān］
Same as "Move 1".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　搫; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 448 02
[Tang Yun] thin official cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Pu official cut, sound plate. [Said the text] It's not correct. And [Guang Ya] In addition to also.　[Tang Yun] Bo Boqie [Jiyun] Bo Boqie,? Yin Po. Also in addition to also. 【Pan Yue·Shooting Pheasant Fu】Take the field and smash the 狄翳. [Note] The name of the person who is dismissed. The shooter, except the ground for the field. Li Yi on the grass also. [Selected Works of Six Ministers] For 㨇.　Phi San also. One said to gather together. [Ji Yun] Or make 㩯.
